trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the transport must ensure that the URI provided for the service to listen on is unique or can be used exactly as provided.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o transporte deve garantir que o URI fornecido para o serviço ao escutar em é exclusivo ou pode ser usado exatamente conforme fornecido.

trans-unit.source: The URI for the endpoint on which a service listens can be set programmatically using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> property and the value of the ListenUriMode for that endpoint is set using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O URI do ponto de extremidade em que um serviço escuta pode ser definido programaticamente usando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>propriedade e o valor de ListenUriMode para esse ponto de extremidade é definido usando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default value for <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> is Explicit.

The value of these properties may also be set using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A> property and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor dessas propriedades também pode ser definido com o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A>propriedade e o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUriMode%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceEndpointElement.ListenUri%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the ListenUriMode is set to Unique the transport is responsible for creating a unique URI.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor de ListenUriMode é definido como Unique o transporte é responsável pela criação de um URI exclusivo.

trans-unit.source: Different transports used by [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] generate this unique URI differently - For TCP in exclusive mode (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> is `false`) this means binding to a uniquely available port number.
trans-unit.target: Transportes diferentes usados por [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] gerar esse URI exclusivo diferentemente - para TCP em modo exclusivo (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> é `false`) isso significa que a associação a um número de porta disponível exclusivamente.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - For TCP in port sharing mode (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> is `true`) and for all of the other existing [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transports, this means appending a unique path (a GUID) to the end of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -Para TCP no modo de compartilhamento de porta (<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A> é `true`) e para todos os outros existente [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] transportes, isso significa acrescentando um caminho exclusivo (uma GUID) ao final de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.TcpTransportBindingElement.PortSharingEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the value of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A> is set to Explicit mode, the transport uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> exactly as it is provided, without modifying it to make it unique.
trans-unit.target: Quando o valor da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A>é definido como o modo Explicit, usa o transporte de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A>exatamente como ele é fornecido sem modificá-lo para torná-lo exclusivo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUriMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the transport should use a transport-specific mechanism to ensure that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri*> is unique.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o transporte deve usar um mecanismo de transporte específico para garantir que o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri*>é exclusivo.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint.ListenUri*>
